generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings, designed for vehicle traffic, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian path is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a building.
- building: A modern building with a grey and white facade is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are present along the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and landscaped areas are visible in the background, particularly around the fountain.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy in the background.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Two cars are visible on the road: one black car in the foreground and another black car to its left.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign with a pedestrian symbol is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the one holding the traffic sign and others supporting streetlights or signs.
